abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32598059, pmid32601651, pmid32589755, pmid32591754, pmid32591762, pmid32589645, pmid32591118, pmid32590808, pmid32609342, pmid32609341, pmid32589716, pmid32603440, pmid32589775, pmid32601708, pmid32602386, pmid32605374, pmid32589691, pmid32590779, pmid32601258
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.03
